about_the_game:
Dive into a thrilling car crushing sim with diverse levels. Each arena offers new stacks of cars to demolish. Customize ramp height and speed for epic crashes, destroy stacks, and earn coins to upgrade your arena.


Unlock and choose from an extensive selection of vehicles, each with its own physics, and experience the excitement of crashing in style with your favorite ride!


Crash your way to victory, rack up points, and revel in the exhilarating fun of destruction. Unleash your inner daredevil and enjoy the addictive chaos!


Choose from an extensive collection of awesome vehicles and go on a smashy rampage!
detailed_description:
Dive into a thrilling car crushing sim with diverse levels. Each arena offers new stacks of cars to demolish. Customize ramp height and speed for epic crashes, destroy stacks, and earn coins to upgrade your arena.


Unlock and choose from an extensive selection of vehicles, each with its own physics, and experience the excitement of crashing in style with your favorite ride!


Crash your way to victory, rack up points, and revel in the exhilarating fun of destruction. Unleash your inner daredevil and enjoy the addictive chaos!


Choose from an extensive collection of awesome vehicles and go on a smashy rampage!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 13 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: Crash Cars - Driven To Destruction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a car crushing simulator that feeds your hunger for speed. Customize your ramp height, slam down the accelerator, and send your car careening into a stunning landscape of time-worn clunkers. Experience the adrenaline rush and embrace the thrill of vehicular destruction.
supported_languages:
English*, Czech*, Dutch*, Russian*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
